body_text: I imagined a scenario where condition could be undefined, null, or an actual value. I realize now, though, that I propTyped it as bool so it shouldn't have to worry about nulls/etc anyway. Good catch.
body: I imagined a scenario where `condition` could be `undefined`, `null`, or an actual value. I realize now, though, that I propTyped it as `bool` so it shouldn't have to worry about nulls/etc anyway. Good catch.
body_html: I imagined a scenario where condition could be undefined, null, or an actual value. I realize now, though, that I propTyped it as bool so it shouldn't have to worry about nulls/etc anyway. Good catch.
